title: Exile
description:
New Cover eBook Edition 1300423919 - 
A 6'5" starship captain flees a lost war and lands on Earth in 1600s feudal Japan. Imagine the possiblities!
Culture Clash! A tall white man from an advanced space traveling culture lands in primitive 1600s feudal Japan. The disparity is obvious. This can go one of two ways. Either the locals can be instantly on the defensive and try to kill or capture this tall interloper, or they can try to learn who and what he is. Which will it be?Kendrick - a starship captain and well-trained warrior loyal to his people and his cause, but the war is lost. He is forced to flee across the galaxy.Gogenko - a pedantic shukido (area protector) trained in the tradition of Bushido, the Way of the Warrrior. Kenshi - Gogenkoâ€™s cousin, fellow martial arts student, and shukido to Honashi Village.Doiyoko - the beautiful if untraditional oldest daughter of the Honashi Village leader.Will they be fast friends or formidable foes?A SciFi tale of strength, honor, respect, and kicking butt! Don't miss it!
author: R.L. Kiser
